sentence: In trading on Tuesday, the Guggenheim BulletShares 2016 Corporate Bond ETF ( BSCG ) is outperforming other ETFs, up about 0.1% on the day.
Components of that ETF showing particular strength include shares of Dupont ( DD ), off about 0.4% and shares of Home Depot ( HD ), off about 1.1% on the day.
And underperforming other ETFs today is the Gold Miners ETF ( GDX ), off about 4% in Tuesday afternoon trading.
Among components of that ETF with the weakest showing on Tuesday were shares of Harmony Gold Mining ( HMY ), lower by about 10.9%, and shares of Coeur Mining (CDE), lower by about 8.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
